DOC.brief_title: Subcutaneous Carbon Dioxide Insufflations Acute Non Specific Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Subcutaneous carbon dioxide insufflation popular Central und Eastern Europe safe inexpensive treatment modality complementary medicine use mainly musculoskeletal pain vascular condition . However , rigorous trial exists efficacy . The study design double blind sham control randomized trial evaluate whether patient acute non specific neck pain get pain free sooner , treat subcutaneous carbon dioxide insufflation compare sham ultrasound.Since acute non specific neck pain often self limit , speed recovery rather outcome fix point time evaluate . Participants receive either maximum number 9 subcutaneous carbon dioxide insufflation maximum number 9 sham ultrasound administer 4 therapist randomize order , thrice weekly . Carbon dioxide gas insufflate subcutaneously location neck muscle tenderness . Per tender location 25 ml carbon dioxide gas administer . Primary outcome measure record daily mean diary . Analysis do intention treat . Differences time curve test use logrank test . Time curve graphically display 1 minus survival Kaplan-Meier plot .
